Metadata: OPERATIONS MANUAL SEA TEMPERATURE MOD. TW-1A (For U.S. Coast Guard use only)
Oregon State University (OSU) Sea Grant College Program

The Model TW-1A sea temperature system was developed by Oregon State University for the U. S. Coast Guard so that the 13th District stations can report local sea temperature via teletype to National Weather Service forecast centers for their use in making coastal weather forecasts.
